name: Sub Clean
description:
DESCRIPTION

Our experience come from the idea of enhancing MUMA, Museo del Mare Milazzo.Their goal is to raise awareness visitors to the topic of anthropic impact and improve the relationship between man and sea. Particularly, we have focused on plastic pollution, with the aim of making the user understand the consequences that someone's harmful behaviors have on the sea and its inhabitants. At the same time we have enhanced the cultural heritage of Milazzo.

THE EXPERIENCE

You'll be a diver who will be able to explore the depths of Milazzo and interact with its characteristic flora and fauna, and you will contribute with recovery interventions by collecting the plastic and interacting with some fish.

HOW TO PLAY TEAM

This application was developed by Bellanova Francesca, Francesco Giacalone, Maria Dolores Aranda Cabeza, Barbara Ruvolo, Filippo Mauro for the Politecnico di Torino course: Realtà Virtuale 2021/22.

This application is in italian.
